name: Plummer Simulator
description:
This is a small simulator game about fixing pipes, toilets, and sinks, getting money from finishing your tasks and buying better wrenches, open the READ ME.md file for more info.

CONTROLS:

Use "wasd" + mouse to move and F2 to toggle hit boxes, once in a hit box of a utility, hold down the left mouse button until the timer reaches zero, you will get more water that you can use to buy wrenches, click the button in the top right corner of your screen to go to the shop, and buy more wrenches (stand in the yellow ring to open the shop and leave it to exit) click the game until your cross hair comes up to lock your mouse and look around.

Press "escape" to get your cursor back once locked

--UPDATE NOTES--

There 's a small  bug in this game that wont let you update any of your states unless the variables the read NaN are fixed in the console, we are working on updates soon and they will be out by monday.
